title: Data Entry Forum Specialist
job_overview:
We’re looking for a Data Entry Forum Specialist who loves engaging in online discussions—especially on Reddit and other niche forums.
Your mission? Help us build our digital presence by joining relevant conversations, sharing valuable insights, and representing our brand with authenticity and professionalism.
What You’ll Do:
• Monitor Reddit threads & forums related to our industry
• Join discussions with thoughtful, on-brand responses
• Track daily engagements and update spreadsheets
• Share insights with our marketing team to improve strategy
• Build positive community relationships and boost brand visibility

 What We’re Looking For:
• Excellent written English & attention to detail
• Familiarity with Reddit and online communities
• Comfortable doing research and writing engaging replies
• Proficient in Google Sheets or Excel
• Self-motivated and organized
• (Bonus) Background in digital marketing, social media, or content writing
KPIs:
• of daily quality posts
• Community growth & activity
• Reddit keyword ranking improvements
If you enjoy spending time on Reddit and have a natural talent for creating meaningful interactions—apply now and join our growing remote team! Click this link: Upgrade to see actual info

We don’t do generic. If you’ve read this far — prove it. ????
On the first question — “Please type the magic phrase” — enter:
 ilovedataentry (or use the phrase given in your job post)


Attach your portfolio or relevant work samples when prompted.
